quests.desc: You are now playing a profound round of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to retrieve the passkey from the floor of the bedchamber. After that, make it so that the locker within the bedchamber is unlocked. After you have unlocked the locker, make sure that the locker inside the bedchamber is ajar. After opening the locker, retrieve the American style keycard from the locker. If you can get your hands on the American style keycard, insert the American style keycard into the American style box in the bedchamber's lock to unlock it. Once you have unlocked the American style box, make absolutely sure that the American style box within the bedchamber is open. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: take American style keycard from locker
unlock American style box with American style keycard
take American style keycard from locker
unlock American style box with American style keycard

quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! Your first objective is to recover the passkey from the bedchamber. And then, make it so that the locker is unlocked. And then, ensure that the locker inside the bedchamber is open. Then, pick up the American style keycard from the locker. And then, unlock the American style box in the bedchamber with the American style keycard. And then, assure that the American style box within the bedchamber is open. And then, go west. With that over with, retrieve the bug from the bench. If you can get your hands on the bug, attempt to travel east. With that accomplished, deposit the bug into the American style box within the bedchamber. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take American style keycard from locker
unlock American style box with American style keycard
insert bug into American style box
take American style keycard from locker
unlock American style box with American style keycard
insert bug into American style box

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a bedchamber, but I guess I was wrong.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a American style box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The American style box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The American style box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. A standard kind of place.

 You can see a bench. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the bench. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bench.[end if] You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the mantelpiece you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedroom. An usual one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a portmanteau. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

 You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a shelf. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_2]On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, retrieve the passkey from the bedchamber. If you have taken the passkey, make it so that the locker is unlocked with the passkey. Then, make absolutely sure that the locker is ajar. After pulling open the locker, recover the American style keycard from the locker inside the bedchamber. If you can get your hands on the American style keycard, unlock the American style box. And then, make absolutely sure that the American style box is ajar. After pulling open the American style box, head west. That done, take the bug from the bench in the bar. After that, make an effort to travel east. With that accomplished, place the bug inside the American style box inside the bedchamber. Alright, thanks!

main_quest.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, retrieve the passkey from the bedchamber. If you have taken the passkey, make it so that the locker is unlocked with the passkey. Then, make absolutely sure that the locker is ajar. After pulling open the locker, recover the American style keycard from the locker inside the bedchamber. If you can get your hands on the American style keycard, unlock the American style box. And then, make absolutely sure that the American style box is ajar. After pulling open the American style box, head west. That done, take the bug from the bench in the bar. After that, make an effort to travel east. With that accomplished, place the bug inside the American style box inside the bedchamber. Alright, thanks!
commands: take American style keycard from locker
unlock American style box with American style keycard
insert bug into American style box
